name: Millennium Thousand-Eyes Virus
text: Tribute 1 DARK monster with 1000 or less ATK, 1 DARK monster with 2000 or more ATK, and 1 DARK monster with 3000 or more ATK; your opponent takes no damage until the end of the next turn after this card resolves, also, look at your opponent's hand, Deck, Extra Deck, all monsters they control, and destroy all monsters among them. During the End Phase of the turn this card was activated: destroy all monsters you control, in your hand, Deck, and Extra Deck. Cards destroyed and sent to the GY by this card's effects cannot activate their own effects that same turn.
